iss.currentPosition: Current position of the International Space Station.
iss.pastPosition: The International Space Station was here at {{time}}.
iss.futurePosition: The International Space Station will be here at {{time}}.

observation.noObservationsYet: The user has not sent observations yet.

title.observationRegister: Creation of an observation– Open Observatory

users.notAccountYet: No account yet? Sign up now.

errors.credentials: The credentials are incorrect, check your input.
errors.unknownConnection: An unknown error occurred during the connection, please try again later.
errors.unknownRegister: An unknown error occurred during your registration.

username.beginLetter: The username must begin with a letter.
username.contain: The username may only contain letters, numbers and underscores.
username.max: The username must not exceed 32 characters

password.upper: The password must contain at least one capital letter.
password.lower: The password must contain at least one lower case letter.
password.number: The password must contain at least one digit.
password.specialCharacter: The password must contain at least one special character.
password.min: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
password.max: The password must not exceed 32 characters.

biography.max: The biography must not exceed 2018 characters.

errors.angle: The angle of orientation should be a value in degrees.

name.min: The name of the celestial body must be at least 4 characters long.
name.max: The name of the celestial body must not exceed 64 characters.

validity.type: The validity of the celestial body must be expressed with a whole number (hours).
validity.min: The validity of the celestial body must be at least 1 hour.
validity.max: The validity of the celestial body cannot exceed 12 hours.
